product.cushioning: Standard cushioning typical of a running shoe, suitable for everyday training.
product.breathability: Breathable mesh construction for general running use.
product.short_description: Experience the sensation of running on clouds with ON Running shoes, the Swiss-engineered footwear that has revolutionized the industry. Founded with a revolutionary idea?to create the perfect running shoe?ON has quickly become a favorite among professional athletes and casual runners alike. The secret to their success is the patented CloudTec? technology, a system of hollow pods on the outsole that compress upon impact to provide a soft, cushioned landing, then lock together to create a rigid surface for a powerful and explosive take-off. This innovation, combined with a mission to design products that feel as light as air, has resulted in a range of shoes that deliver an unparalleled running experience. From the versatile Cloud series for everyday training to the performance-focused Cloudflow and the maximum-cushioned Cloudmonster, there's an ON shoe for every runner and every distance. Beyond performance, ON is committed to a unique, modern aesthetic and a dedication to quality that is synonymous with Swiss design. Join the movement and discover why runners around the world are switching to ON for a softer, more responsive, and undeniably unique ride.
